/bin/c++ CMakeFiles/build_db_from_kmers.dir/build_db_from_kmers.cpp.o CMakeFiles/build_db_from_kmers.dir/cmake_device_link.o -o build_db_from_kmers   -L/usr/local/cuda/lib64  -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -L/usr/local/cuda-12.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-12.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib: libgpu_kmer_database.a -lcudart -lcuda -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
